nodes.text: The Bars Barka system was a star system located in the Barsa sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim that contained the planet Bars Barka, which was inhabited by Ubese colonists.
The Bars Barka system was established in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square J-6.
